label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_028
content:
## 2024-09-09 Daily Operations Summary

- Screen Failures Cumulative: 55

- 25mg: 20
- 50mg: 21
- 100mg: 23

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-2878, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: false, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2818, Description: urinary tract infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 10mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2834, Description: hyperkalemia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 100mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-2828, Description: GFR measurement repeated due to hemolyzed sample, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: RB-PD-2826, Description: Missed scheduled renal ultrasound, rescheduled, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory
- Site 04 monitoring visit completed, 3 findings
- Central lab urine biomarker batch analysis completed for Week 28

### Notes
- Week 28: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 84 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
